caption.text:
• PILI’s pigment meteor shower •

Originally, we wanted to show the blue color of the pigment that was almost black when dried powdered. This simple trick created such hypnotyzing micro-landscapes that it has become a highly recognizable signature for PILI.

Set up & video: Marie-Sarah Adenis 
@mariesarah.adenis
